item.title: PacktPub Review: Effective Jenkins
item.description: Recently, I reviewed a video course from Packt Publishing: “Effective Jenkins: Improving Quality in the Delivery Pipeline with Jenkins” Thanks to Packt Publishing for this opportunity, and thanks to Dwayne D’Souza for the collaboration! So, I want to talk about the content of this course. Before to Start This course is for people who know the basics about Jenkins. If you don’t, I would recommend learning about this from their previous courses:
